</title>

<traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 96 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 70 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

An _energizing treat_ is a treat made from meat or grains. When you feed your [animal companion](/Rules.aspx?ID=149) or [familiar](/Rules.aspx?ID=160) an energizing treat, it's [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) for 1 minute. It can use the extra action each round only for Strike, Stride, and [Support](/Actions.aspx?ID=342) actions, and it can do so only if it normally has those actions available and you take the proper action to command it.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
